Entries.Wellwick: Did this letter surprise you, @?^I sent this to thank you for always playing around with Rasma.^She usually... doesn't like to be with other people, right?^Still, I wanted to thank you for always coming here.^Please continue to help me take good care of Rasma from now on.^ ^*PS: It's exciting to have new friends to spend time together with!^      -Wellwick%item object 72 1 %%[#]Wellwick's Letter

Did this letter surprise you, @?^I sent this to thank you for being so close with Rasma.^She usually... doesn't like to be with other people, right?^Still, I can't believe you actually got married! Good job melting that grumpy heart!^Please continue to take good care of Rasma from now on.^ ^*PS: It's exciting to have new friends to spend time together with!^      -Wellwick%item object 72 1 %%[#]Wellwick's Letter
When it rains, sometimes my joints hurt...$3#$b#How does Rasmodia manage?#$e#... Should I cut down on alcohol..?$2

Entries.Mon8: Today I checked the weather through the window.#$b#It's such a beautiful day, do you want to go out with me and Rasma?$4#$e#What? You should come with us...$2
Entries.Tue4: Do you know what day it is?#$b#Today... It's Tuesday!$1#$e#Rasma dislikes those kind of jokes. She's no fun.$2
Entries.Tue6: @, do you want a drink?#$b#Rasma doesn't want to drink with me.$2
Entries.Tue8: I will tell you one of Rasma's secrets.#$b#Rasmodia, in reality--#$b#H-Hey!! Rasma, what are you doing?$3#$b#Keeping me from talking, that's so rude!$7
Entries.Wed4: My friend from the desert sent me an invitation to explore the Skull Cavern. But I didn't want to go there...$2#$b#I went anyway... and despite my prediction, we were surrounded by mummies!$7#$b#Fortunately, Rasma saved my life. But it was such a terryfing experience!$3
Entries.Thu4: It's really boring to be here all the time.#$b#So, I want to go out more often. I tried to annoy Rasma into taking me, but she wouldn't leave.$2#$b#How boring...$3
Entries.Thu8: How is the farm going, @?#$b#Can we hang out when we are not busy?$4#$e#What? I'm not trying to get out of work, Rasma!$7
Entries.Thu10: Hmm? Am I in debt?$6#$b#No, that's not true! Who spreads those rumors?$7#$e#Rasma! Don't laugh!$5
Entries.Fri4: Actually, I'm staying here temporarily to help Rasma.#$b#It's like she can't take care of herself without me.$1
Entries.Sat10: Don't you get tired from always coming here?$4#$b#Rasma built this tower really far away... It must take you a while to get here, right?#$e#She is so outdated. Hey! Rasma, don't glare at me like that!$7
Entries.Sun8: Sundays are the start of the week!#$b#Honestly, it's hard to remember what day it is when you spend so much time in the tower.$2#$b#All of it because Rasma-wasma can't do without me, right? Rasma?$1#$e#Hey! I'm joking, Rasma!$7
Entries.spring_12: Do you usually do well at egg hunts, @?#$b#If Rasma was involved, she'd win first place! She's very competitive, secretly!$1
Entries.summer_10: Rasma and I sneak bowls of soup when the regular people aren't looking.#$b#So please, don't put any strange ingredients.$1
Entries.summer_28: And the summer is coming to an end.#$b#But Rasma and I don't think it matters much!$1#$b#Both of us use magic to regulate the temperature anyways.$0
Entries.winter_16: Tomorrow is Rasma's birthday.#$b#Even if it's a hassle, I'll have her favorite gift ready.$1#$e#Don't be silly, Rasma! You have to wait for it!$7
Entries.joja_Begin: The spirits are grieving. Did Rasma's letter mean nothing to you?

Entries.Outdoor_1: If a person locks themselves in a tower, they'll go crazy.#$b#Oh! I would never say such a thing about Rasma. Never!$7
Entries.spring_12: Are you going to visit me this egg festival, too?#$b#I'll take a look with Rasma. Work hard and come back.$9

Entries.Wellwick: Today is a good day to look around.#$b#When I return, I should try to dance with Rasma...$8

Eh? Why am I here and not at the tent?$6#$e#Ummm... a little trick. Rasma created an illusion of me.$2#$b#If you look closely, it doesn't look like me at all! But I can have a little fun and then leave right away when Rasma calls me!$7#$e#So let's enjoy ourselves a little more.
It's so cold in here..! I'm afraid I'll have to ask Rasmodia to do magic with the thermostat...$7
